channel.title: CVE Feed for M-Files -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for M-Files -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-41807|2024-09-16T21:02:53.545Z -- m-files -- m-files%20server
item.description: Lack of rate limiting in M-Files Server and M-Files Web products with versions before 21.12.10873.0 in certain type of user accounts allows unlimited amount of attempts and therefore makes brute-forcing login accounts easier.
